channel.title: How to change staff commands to regular players
channel.description: hi i got a list of commands but they all for staff and i wanna change them to regular ppl but ill idk how so plz some 1 help

item.title: How to change staff commands to regular players
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I know how to do that

Read full topic
item.source: How to change staff commands to regular players

item.title: How to change staff commands to regular players
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:5, topic:288370”][quote author=p00n99range link=topic=381245.msg2865037#msg2865037 date=1247419320]
Owner nader, you should show him what you mean by showing a example. You don’t know if he is skilled with coding or not.

Here you go:

if (command.startsWith("pkon") && playerRights >= 2) { IsAttacking = false; AttackingOn = 0; resetAnimation(); IsUsingSkill = false; yell("["+playerName+"] - turned pking on!"); }
Where it says playerRights >= 2) {
you would change the 2 to 0 for player status.

0 = players
1 = mod
2 = admin
3 = owner
4 = hidden co owner

Player Command:

if (command.startsWith("pkon") && playerRights >= 0) { IsAttacking = false; AttackingOn = 0; resetAnimation(); IsUsingSkill = false; yell("["+playerName+"] - turned pking on!"); }

[/quote]That’s too advanced for Owner Nader, so he could not post anything worth posting.[/quote]
Calling on a method from another class is too advanced for Telenim.

p00n99range:

I noticed. People on moparscape forums are “dumb.” They don’t spoon feed people when you should cause half of them are newbs.

If someone asks enough questions, they won’t need to be spoon fed, plus they’ll learn something (all spoon feeding is best done via PM.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to change staff commands to regular players
